bodies.title: Who I am
bodies.description: I'm currently based in Berlin and available to work locally or remotely. I have extensive experience in the film and tv/web advertising industries and know the ins and outs of these worlds. I have also experience in publishing. I'm a creative problem solver and excel at finding solutions to untypical problems.

bodies.title: Tools I like to use
bodies.description: Javascript, React, Gatsby, Ruby on Rails, GraphQL, SCSS, SVG, Serverless, Sketch, Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere, DaVinci Resolve

descriptions.title: Websites
descriptions.description: I create fast and responsive websites using the latest web technology, in order to pique viewer curiosity, express brand ambition and encourage customer loyalty.

descriptions.title: Web Apps / Mobile Apps
descriptions.description: By putting the emphasis on user experience, I create seamless and intuitive applications that empower and delight users.
